BackstoryDef.title: Political Dynasty Heir
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Enclave's political elite on the Poseidon Oil Rig. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up surrounded by pre-war American ideals and the belief in genetic purity. From childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] was groomed for leadership, studying governance, rhetoric, and the Enclave's vision for America's restoration.

BackstoryDef.title: Enclave President
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became President of the Enclave, leading the remnants of the United States government. [PAWN_pronoun] championed the FEV Curling-13 project to eradicate all "mutated" life in the wasteland. [PAWN_possessive] unwavering belief in genetic purity made [PAWN_objective] a dangerous ideologue who would stop at nothing to achieve [PAWN_possessive] vision of a cleansed America.

BackstoryDef.title: Officer's Son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the West Coast but traveled with [PAWN_possessive] father's unit to the Capital Wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in military camps, learning discipline and combat tactics from an early age. The death of [PAWN_possessive] father instilled in [PAWN_objective] a fierce determination to prove [PAWN_possessive] worth and continue the family legacy.

BackstoryDef.title: Enclave Colonel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to become Colonel and de facto leader of Enclave forces in the Capital Wasteland. Unlike Richardson, [PAWN_pronoun] believed the Enclave should control the wasteland's population rather than exterminate them. [PAWN_possessive] pragmatic approach and tactical brilliance made [PAWN_objective] a formidable commander, though [PAWN_pronoun] still held unwavering loyalty to Enclave supremacy.

BackstoryDef.title: Giant Child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born abnormally large even as a child. The Enclave saw [PAWN_possessive] size and strength as valuable assets rather than defects. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained from youth to be a weapon, learning to channel [PAWN_possessive] size into devastating combat effectiveness. [PAWN_pronoun] never questioned orders, only executed them.

BackstoryDef.title: Secret Service Enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Secret Service until exposure to FEV transformed [PAWN_objective] into a super mutant. Rather than terminate [PAWN_objective], the Enclave encased [PAWN_objective] in specially modified power armor, creating an unstoppable killing machine. [PAWN_pronoun] became the Enclave's ultimate enforcer, utterly loyal and mercilessly efficient. [PAWN_possessive] humanity was buried beneath layers of augmentation and conditioning.

BackstoryDef.title: Strict Upbringing
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up under extremely rigid military discipline on the Oil Rig. [PAWN_possessive] parents were both career soldiers who tolerated no deviation from protocol. This upbringing forged [PAWN_objective] into someone who valued order, discipline, and following procedures above all else. [PAWN_pronoun] had no patience for incompetence or excuses.

BackstoryDef.title: Drill Sergeant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the Enclave's most feared drill sergeant. [PAWN_pronoun] trained countless soldiers with brutal efficiency, accepting nothing less than perfection. [PAWN_possessive] legendary temper and devastating verbal tirades became infamous throughout Enclave ranks. While [PAWN_pronoun] was despised, the soldiers [PAWN_pronoun] trained were among the finest the Enclave had.

BackstoryDef.title: Scientific Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional aptitude for biology and chemistry from a young age. The Enclave's scientific division nurtured [PAWN_possessive] talents, providing access to pre-war research data and advanced laboratory equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] studied virology and genetic engineering, fascinated by the potential to reshape humanity at the molecular level.

BackstoryDef.title: Viral Weaponeer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed the FEV Curling-13 virus, designed to kill anyone with even trace amounts of wasteland mutation. [PAWN_pronoun] justified this genocide as necessary for humanity's survival, believing only pure humans deserved to inherit Earth. [PAWN_possessive] brilliant but twisted mind created one of the most dangerous bioweapons in post-war history.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Trainee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was originally trained as a scribe in the Brotherhood of Steel. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at advanced physics and engineering, working on Project Purity. However, [PAWN_pronoun] grew frustrated with the Brotherhood's cautious approach to technology and their unwillingness to push boundaries in pursuit of progress.

BackstoryDef.title: Enclave Defector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] defected to the Enclave, believing they had the resources and willingness to complete Project Purity properly. [PAWN_pronoun] worked on adapting the purifier to the Enclave's needs, though [PAWN_pronoun] was kept in the dark about Colonel Autumn's true plans. [PAWN_possessive] scientific ambition blinded [PAWN_objective] to the Enclave's darker intentions.

BackstoryDef.title: Robotics Enthusiast
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated by robots and artificial intelligence from childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] spent countless hours studying pre-war robotics manuals and programming guides. The Enclave recognized [PAWN_possessive] talent and provided specialized training in cybernetics and AI systems.

BackstoryDef.title: Hellfire Engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in Enclave research facilities, helping develop the Hellfire power armor and advanced combat robots. [PAWN_pronoun] became socially isolated, preferring the company of machines to people. [PAWN_possessive] work was brilliant but [PAWN_pronoun] rarely considered the ethical implications of [PAWN_possessive] creations. Eventually, the weight of what [PAWN_pronoun] had helped create began to trouble [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Elite Cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was selected for elite officer training from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in tactical simulations and power armor operations. The Enclave's instructors saw [PAWN_objective] as officer material, grooming [PAWN_objective] for command positions in their most critical operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Hellfire Commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded Enclave Hellfire trooper units in the Capital Wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] led brutal operations against Brotherhood of Steel positions and wastelander settlements. [PAWN_possessive] tactical acumen and ruthless efficiency made [PAWN_objective] one of Colonel Autumn's most valuable officers. [PAWN_pronoun] wore the experimental Hellfire armor, marking [PAWN_objective] as an elite among elites.

BackstoryDef.title: Strategic Thinker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed talent for strategic thinking and logistics from youth. [PAWN_pronoun] studied pre-war military campaigns and learned to coordinate complex operations. The Enclave trained [PAWN_objective] in both combat leadership and strategic planning, preparing [PAWN_objective] for field command.

BackstoryDef.title: Field Major
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a field major, coordinating Enclave operations across multiple fronts. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded squads in X-02 power armor and planned strategic strikes against enemy positions. [PAWN_possessive] ability to adapt tactics to changing battlefield conditions earned [PAWN_objective] respect from both superiors and subordinates.

BackstoryDef.title: Military Brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a military child, moving between Enclave facilities. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to adapt quickly and became proficient in various combat scenarios. Watching [PAWN_possessive] parents serve with distinction inspired [PAWN_objective] to pursue a military career and prove [PAWN_pronoun] could excel in the male-dominated officer corps.

BackstoryDef.title: Enclave Captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned [PAWN_possessive] captain's rank through demonstrated combat excellence and tactical leadership. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded power armor squads in frontline operations, proving that skill and determination mattered more than gender. [PAWN_possessive] troops respected [PAWN_objective] for leading from the front and never asking them to do anything [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't do [PAWN_pronoun]self.
